html.p: This dashboard and these panels illustrate extracting failed 802.1X wireless user information from a specific location.

chart.title: Failed Authentications Wireless - $location$
chart.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-failed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | chart count by AuthenticationMethod | rename AuthenticationMethod AS "Authentication Method"

table.title: Failed Authentications by User Name
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-failed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" EapAuthentication="EAP-TLS" | stats count by EapAuthentication UserName Address EndPointMACAddress FailureReason | `format_field_names`

table.title: Authentication Failure Details
table.searchString: eventtype=cisco-ise-failed-authentication Location="$location$" NAS_Port_Type="Wireless - IEEE 802.11" | stats count by EapAuthentication NetworkDeviceGroups NetworkDeviceName NAS_Identifier NAS_Port NAS_IP_Address Called_Station_ID Calling_Station_ID Airespace_Wlan_Id | `format_field_names`
